channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Best In The World': PSG Eyes Luis Enrique Extension Amid Manchester United Links
item.description: Manchester United's hopes of landing Luis Enrique have suffered a major setback as PSG have opened talks to extend his contract beyond 2027.

item.title: Ex-Giants QB Eli Manning Reportedly Falls Short of Hall of Fame Induction Again
item.description: Eli Manning will have to wait at least another year for induction into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.

item.title: Sources: Rockets' Adams has surgery, season over
item.description: Rockets center Steven Adams, who is averaging 8.6 rebounds this season, has undergone season-ending surgery on his left ankle, sources told ESPN.
